Package: au.com.redboxresearchdata.util.integration.interceptor

[Groovy] Class TransmissionInterceptorAdapter

      • au.com.redboxresearchdata.util.integration.interceptor.TransmissionInterceptorAdapter
      • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
        org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware

        class TransmissionInterceptorAdapter
extends org.springframework.integration.channel.interceptor.ChannelInterceptorAdapter

        Interceptor that is aware of message transmission, reacting to events by either processing the event or sends a message to the target channel. Default processing is to shutdown the application context when the buffer is empty. TODO: add event processing

        Authors:
        Shilo Banihit
        Since:
        1.0

          • org.springframework.context.support.AbstractApplicationContext applicationContext

          • static final org.apache.log4j.Logger log

          • boolean sendCompletionMessage

            Whether to send an event: when all messages are sent. Default is false.

          • final java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger sendCount

          • boolean shouldCountPresending

            Whether to count messages while presending or rely on manual message count increments. Default is true

          • boolean shutdownContext

            Whether to shutdown the context after all messages are sent. Default is true.
